about_the_game:
Lone Wolf or Group Up

Players must survive the north using anything at their disposal. You can fight as a lone wolf in the wild or with friends in a home. Every encounter can change the outcome of your journey in the North. From fierce battles for resources to alliances, adaptability and resilience are important in this ever-changing landscape, where fate hangs on your ability to survive and the unpredictable forces of Nature and the Infected.

Looting/Crafting

In the Swiss Alps, survival means scavenging gear from villages, like damaged clothes. Crafting essentials or gather resources to keep yourself alive, or battling foes for superior equipment. For the boldest, venturing into quarantined zones yields invaluable loot. Gear up and adapt to survive.

Fight or Die Trying

Littered with PVPVE action, players will not be able to escape an encounter with players, or the infected. Whether you're in the mountains or in the plains. Experience intense adrenaline pumping firefights to stay alive, or prey on your enemies to survive in the wilds. But tread carefully, there may be other players hiding and waiting to strike on you. Always peek over your shoulder.

Surviving the Silent North

In the Swiss Alps, survival means facing the Infected and other players. Gathering resources is essential for sustaining basic needs like food, water, and warmth amidst constant danger. Adaptation and resilience are key to surviving over these challenges.

Stay Frosty within the Silent North

name: Silent North

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i7 7700k or Higher
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080GTX or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: Silent North thrusts you into the Swiss Alps, battling the elements, Infected, and other players. Fight solo or team up, scavenging gear and crafting essentials. Intense PVPVE action ensures constant danger. Adapt, be resilient, and survive in this unpredictable, ever-changing landscape
